full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DRAG PO GSUM 'BREL LA BRTEN PA'I BUM SGRUB BKRU BYABS BSRUNG GSUM DUG DBYUNG DANG BCAS PA BYA TSUL SKYE 'GRO'I GDUNG BA SEL BA'I SMAN MCHOG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B (ZHES DRAG PO SUM 'BREL LA BRTEN PA'I BUM SGRUB BKRU BYABS DUG DBYUNG DANG BCAS PA BYA TSUL 'DI YANG, DGA' LDAN CHOS GLING GI BYANG 'DREN 'JAM DBYANGS DPAL LDAN GYIS LHA RDZAS DANG BCAS MO LA BA DANG, 'DI KA'I GRVA RIGS BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS KYIS LHA DAR MAndAL DANG BCAS BSKUL NGOR, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN SENGGES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI MDZAD PA'I TSA BO BSTAN PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BGYIS PA DZA YANTU, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
